summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and related count slips from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit and includes official count verification slips, providing a snapshot of the facility's census on that date.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording counts by housing unit (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It shows a total inmate count of 758 (verified as 754) across various housing units at the MCC.
The document includes official count verification slips, indicating standard prison administrative procedures were being followed.
Housing units listed include H-A (with a count of 4), which may be relevant to Epstein's housing assignment.
The document is part of routine prison record-keeping that would be examined as part of the investigation into Epstein's death.
